page.title: 20Crowthorne Concerns
page.content:
The parish council is to press for more{parking spaces,}despite a refusal from Bracknell District Council due to lack of available funds.
A petition has been sent to Berkshire County Council deploring the {postponement}of the provision of a {Nursery Unit}at Broadmoor School.
The future of the{charity shop,}which is the sole source of income for the village's short stay home and day centre for the elderly, is secure for the next two years as the council have renewed the lease on the premises.
The information on this disk has been collected by the children of{Broadmoor {Primary}and{Edgbarrow Comprehensive {Schools.}They would like to thank the people of Crowthorne for their help.
